_meta.description: Complete catalog of in-game proposals with prerequisites, costs, effects, and unlock conditions.
_meta.notes: Proposals are offered during gameplay based on prerequisites. Some are repeatable with escalating costs. Certain proposals are mutually exclusive (e.g., Tenabolt collaboration vs opposition).

sources.name: In-game observation
sources.notes: Data collected from proposal descriptions and gameplay testing

sources.name: Discord Community
sources.notes: Data additions, corrections, and suggestions made by members of the discord community

proposals.name: Remote Backups
effects: Remove malware when regular uninstalls fail
proposals.description: Adds a new 'sftp' routine to netshell. Allows backup of configs/files on remote devices for price of 450. The routine can also be used to remove malware when regular program uninstalls do not work.

proposals.name: Botnets Research

prerequisites.notes: Having 5+ compute servers increases selection chance

effects: Configure bots that generate visitor traffic to enterprises
proposals.description: Adds a new 'botconf' routine to netshell. Allow configuration of bots that can generate visitor traffic to enterprises. Funding costs 665.

proposals.name: High Availability Research

prerequisites.notes: Having 7+ network routers increases selection chance

effects: Configure high-availability setup on HA-enabled routers
proposals.description: Adds a new 'haconf' routine to netshell. Allow configuration of high-availability setup on ha-enabled routers. Funding costs 600.

proposals.name: Jailbreaker

abilities: sftp can install programs extracted from devices

effects: The 'sftp' routine can now install programs extracted from devices
proposals.description: The 'sftp' routine can now be used to install programs extracted from devices. Costs 1000.

proposals.name: NetOps Research
effects: Automation utility for managing and monitoring network
proposals.description: Adds automation utility for managing and monitoring your network for the price of 330. Unlocks the 'cron', 'try' and 'notify' routines on NetShell.

proposals.name: Power Management Research
proposals.lore: Keep bills low and reliability high.
proposals.description: Adds power management utility for managing device power state for the price of 225. Unlocks the 'power' routines on NetShell.

proposals.name: Route Discovery Protocol v1 (RIP)

prerequisites.notes: Having 7+ network routers increases selection chance

proposals.description: Adds a new 'rip' routine to netshell. Allow configuration of automated route discoveries on routers for price of 1500.

proposals.name: Scanning Exploit

abilities: netsh and autograph scans bypass all router rules

effects: Netsh and autograph scans bypass all router rules
proposals.description: Allows netsh and autograph scans to bypass all router rules for a cost of 1200. The exploit can be optionally turned on/off.

proposals.name: Virtual Machines Research

prerequisites.notes: Having 5+ compute servers increases selection chance

proposals.description: Adds a new 'vmconf' routine to netshell. Allow configuration of virtual machines on servers. Funding costs 999.

proposals.name: Elevator Upgrade
effects: Decrease elevator wait time by 50% per level
proposals.description: Decrease elevator wait time by 50.0%. Each level provides the same benefit and requires the previous level.

proposals.name: Second Monitor
effects: Allows use of a second monitor by pressing right-alt
proposals.description: Allows use of a second monitor by pressing right-alt. Costs 2500

proposals.name: New Data Center
proposals.cost_notes: No upfront cost, increases admin fees by 10% each
effects: Adds new location and expands available space
proposals.description: Request for a new data center, increases administrative fees by 10.0%. Adds new location and expands available space.

proposals.name: Internet Exchange Point One
proposals.lore: Now the whole world had one language and a common speech.
effects: Cross-tower internet with strict SLA requirements
proposals.description: Request an internet exchange point with another tower. An internet exchange point is a floor with a connection point to another tower. Allowing cross-tower internet pays handsomely but is risky due to the strict SLA requirements.

proposals.name: Liability Insurance
effects: SLA breaches no longer end the game
proposals.description: SLA breaches no longer ends the game, but comes with a financial penalty of 3000 per breach. Adds a recurring premium cost of 300 per day.

proposals.name: Lean Administration
effects: Permanently reduce daily admin expenses by 30% per level
proposals.description: Permanently reduce daily admin expenses by 30.0% at the cost of upfront payment. Each level provides the same 30% reduction benefit.

proposals.name: Refurbhut Investment
proposals.description: Fund 555 to support the opening of the RefurbHut merchant, which provides cheap refurbished (no warranty) devices.

proposals.name: Support the Cabler's Union (Basic)
effects: Unlocks more proposals for the Cabler's Union
proposals.description: Fund 300 to support the Cabler's Union, an R&D institute for the benefit of cabling workers. This unlocks more proposals for the Cabler's Union (merchant and discounts).

proposals.name: Support the Cabler's Union (Discounts)
effects: Cheaper cable prices from DMarket merchants
proposals.description: Fund 300 to support the Cabler's Union, an R&D institute for the benefit of cabling workers. In return, they promise to lobby for cheaper cable prices (discount %) from the merchants on the DMarket.

proposals.name: Support the Cabler's Union (Merchant)
effects: Cabler's Union can sell their prototypes on D-Market
proposals.description: Fund 300 to support the Cabler's Union, an R&D institute for the benefit of cabling workers. This let's them sell their prototypes on the D-Market.

proposals.name: Fusion Plant Funding (Phase 1)
effects: Reduce all Data Center power cost by 20%
proposals.mutual_exclusivity_notes: Choosing Legal Retaliation or Lobby Against blocks this proposal
proposals.description: Support Tenabolt Corporation's effort in building a fusion power plant by funding 1000. Reduce all Data Center power cost by 20.0%

proposals.name: Fusion Plant Funding (Phase 2)
effects: Reduce all Data Center power cost by 50%
Reduces probability of power outage/surge by 10%
proposals.description: Support Tenabolt Corporation's effort in building a fusion power plant by funding 2000. Reduce all Data Center power cost by 50.0%. Reduces probability of power outage/surge by 10.0%

proposals.name: Legal Retaliation
proposals.lore: Another power outage? See you in court!
proposals.cost_notes: No upfront cost, merchant pricing increases
proposals.mutual_exclusivity_notes: Blocks Fusion Plant proposals. Does NOT prevent Lobby Against from appearing (possible bug).
proposals.description: Lawyer up against Tenabolt Corporation. This proposal eliminates future collaboration with Tenabolt Corporation. Tenabolt Corporation now pays penalties per outage/surge events. All items sold by Tenabolt reseller become more expensive.

proposals.name: Lobby Against Tenabolt Corporation
proposals.cost_notes: No upfront cost, merchant pricing increases
effects: Tenabolt cannot issue fines for non-DC power use
proposals.mutual_exclusivity_notes: Blocks Fusion Plant proposals. Does NOT prevent Legal Retaliation from appearing (possible bug).
proposals.description: Lobby for new law against Tenabolt Corporation. This proposal eliminates future collaboration with Tenabolt Corporation. Tenabolt Corporation can no longer issue fines against non Data Center power use. All items sold by Tenabolt reseller become more expensive.

proposals.name: Overvoltage Directive
proposals.tradeoff: More surges (damage risk) but fewer blackouts
proposals.description: +30.0% of power surge occurring, -30.0% of power outage occurring. Stamp duty costs vary by level. Trade-off: More surges (damage risk) but fewer blackouts. Each level provides the same effect.

proposals.name: Undervoltage Directive
proposals.tradeoff: More blackouts (downtime) but fewer surges (less hardware damage)
proposals.description: -30.0% of power surge occurring, +30.0% of power outage occurring. Stamp duty costs vary by level. Trade-off: More blackouts (downtime) but fewer surges (less hardware damage). Each level provides the same effect.

proposals.name: PADU Development Funding
proposals.description: Fund the development of PADU v3 database software.

proposals.name: Poems DB
proposals.lore: A DB just for the text chads.
proposals.description: Fund the development of Poems DB database software.

proposals.name: Sun DNS
proposals.description: Fund the development of Sun DNS server software.

proposals.name: KEA DHCP Server
proposals.description: Fund the development of KEA DHCP Server software.

starting_proposals.notes: These 15 proposals can appear as starting proposals when beginning a new game. See seed-finder.html for seed database.
